Method Detail

testFile

public boolean testFile(java.lang.String filename)
This is designed to run a file that will create grammar and tests its vailidity agains some predefined rules. The test file format is very simple, each line starts with a letter followed by a colon.
  • a: adds a line
  • v: validates a line
  • i: invalidates a line
If any of of validate rules fail to vailidate or any of the invalidate rules are valid it will display an error showing which line and sentance.

Parameters:
filename - The file to parse
Returns:
true if the file vaildated correctly otherwise false.

parseFile

public void parseFile(java.lang.String filename)
Reans in a simple file with sentances seperated by newlines, and builds the grammar. A hash(#) at the beginning of a line means that line will not be parsed.

Parameters:
filename -
